column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We ordered a 30 day aged rib eye and a petite filet--both med rare. He had the rib eye with marrow and sauteed mushrooms on top. Awesome
column2: even if you aren't into the whole weird food thing. Marrow gives it extra flavor like truffle or fat that flavors meat. I had the filet
column4: it was enough for me. For sides we had creamed spinach (with blue cheese)
column5: mashed potatoes and asparagus. Everything was amaze.
